headline.main: Exclusive: U.S. to Back New System Warning Airlines in Conflict Zones
headline.print_headline: Exclusive: U.S. to Back New System Warning Airlines in Conflict Zones

docs.snippet: The United States will throw its support behind a proposal by the U.N.'s aviation agency to share information about risks to commercial aircraft over conflict zones after the downing of a Malaysian jet in Ukraine last year, according to a senior U...
docs.lead_paragraph: The United States will throw its support behind a proposal by the U.N.'s aviation agency to share information about risks to commercial aircraft over conflict zones after the downing of a Malaysian jet in Ukraine last year, according to a senior U.S. official.

headline.main: Judge Vacates Guilty Pleas of Men Charged With Insider Trading in I.B.M. Stock

docs.snippet: A federal judge’s ruling on Thursday reflects the fallout from an appeals court decision in December that narrowed the definition of what constitutes insider trading....
docs.abstract: A federal judge’s ruling on Thursday reflects the fallout from an appeals court decision in December that narrowed the definition of what constitutes insider trading.

headline.main: Man Close to Running 7 Marathons in 7 Days on 7 Continents
headline.print_headline: Man Close to Running 7 Marathons in 7 Days on 7 Continents

headline.main: Mexico Removes Security Envoy From Troubled Michoacan
headline.print_headline: Mexico Removes Security Envoy From Troubled Michoacan

docs.snippet: The federal security commissioner appointed a little over a year ago for the troubled western state of Michoacan confirmed Thursday that he is being withdrawn by Mexico's government....
docs.lead_paragraph: The federal security commissioner appointed a little over a year ago for the troubled western state of Michoacan confirmed Thursday that he is being withdrawn by Mexico's government.

docs.snippet: DreamWorks Animation said Thursday it is reducing the number of films it produces each year from three to two and cutting 500 jobs as it tries to improve its profitability....
docs.lead_paragraph: DreamWorks Animation said Thursday it is reducing the number of films it produces each year from three to two and cutting 500 jobs as it tries to improve its profitability.

headline.main: ECB's Nowotny Wonders if It Was Wise to 'Shoot Last Wad'
headline.print_headline: ECB's Nowotny Wonders if It Was Wise to 'Shoot Last Wad'

docs.snippet: The European Central Bank might have been better off waiting to start an expanded asset-buying program, ECB Governing Council member Ewald Nowotny said after the ECB launched a bold program to reflate a sagging euro zone economy....
docs.lead_paragraph: The European Central Bank might have been better off waiting to start an expanded asset-buying program, ECB Governing Council member Ewald Nowotny said after the ECB launched a bold program to reflate a sagging euro zone economy.

headline.main: Guard Hurt in Prison Bus Crash Out of ICU, Off Critical List
headline.print_headline: Guard Hurt in Prison Bus Crash Out of ICU, Off Critical List

docs.snippet: A Texas prison guard critically injured in a prison bus wreck that killed 10 people has been removed from intensive care....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Texas prison guard critically injured in a prison bus wreck that killed 10 people has been removed from intensive care.

headline.main: Tips for Surviving the Sundance Film Festival, From Adam Scott of "Parks and Recreation"

headline.main: Aaron Hernandez Associate Pleads Guilty to Federal Charges
headline.print_headline: Aaron Hernandez Associate Pleads Guilty to Federal Charges

docs.snippet: An associate of former New England Patriots tight end Aaron Hernandez has pleaded guilty to federal charges of lying to a grand jury, witness tampering, obstruction of justice and a gun conspiracy charge....
docs.lead_paragraph: An associate of former New England Patriots tight end Aaron Hernandez has pleaded guilty to federal charges of lying to a grand jury, witness tampering, obstruction of justice and a gun conspiracy charge.

headline.main: JPMorgan's Dimon Gets Cash Bonus, Total Pay Unchanged
headline.print_headline: JPMorgan's Dimon Gets Cash Bonus, Total Pay Unchanged

docs.snippet: JPMorgan Chase & Co paid Chief Executive Jamie Dimon a first cash bonus in three years, part of a total 2014 pay package of $20 million that was unchanged from the year before....
docs.lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase & Co paid Chief Executive Jamie Dimon a first cash bonus in three years, part of a total 2014 pay package of $20 million that was unchanged from the year before.
